keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: This filled flan makes a quick and easy meal for all the family.

method.text: Place the pastry case on to a baking tray. Spread passata over the base of the pastry case. Arrange the tomato wedges on top.
Top with the remaining ingredients. Season to taste.
Place in the oven for 8-10 min, until golden brown.

title: Deep filled pizza pie
